Raw IR Codes
01/06/2013

Verizon FIOS Remote

CH 1 - m8750 s4600 m400 s4500 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s4500 m400 s4500 m450 s4500 m450 s4500 m450
CH 2 - m8750 s4600 m450 s2250 m450 s4500 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s4500 m450 s4500 m450 s4500 m400
CH 3 - m8750 s4550 m450 s4500 m450 s4500 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s4500 m450 s2250 m450 s4500 m450 s4500 m400

CH 5 - m8750 s4600 m450 s4500 m400 s2300 m450 s4500 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s4500 m400 s4500 m450 s2300 m400 s4500 m450
CH 6 - m8750 s4600 m400 s2300 m450 s4500 m400 s4500 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s4500 m400 s2300 m400 s4500 m450
CH 7 - m8750 s4600 m450 s4500 m400 s4500 m450 s4500 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s4500 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s4500 m450
CH 8 - m8750 s4550 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s4500 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s4500 m450

CH 0 - m8750 s4600 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2300 m400 s2300 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450 s2250 m450

Yamaha A/V Receiver Remote

Power On - 		NEC 7E817E81, LEN = 32 bits
Power Off -		NEC 7E81FE01, LEN = 32 bits
Increase Volume -	NEC 5EA158A7, LEN = 32 bits
Decrease Volume -	NEC 5EA1D827, LEN = 32 bits
Change Input DVD -	NEC 5EA1837C, LEN = 32 bits
Change Input Cable -	NEC 5EA12AD5, LEN = 32 bits
Change Input CD -	NEC 5EA1A857, LEN = 32 bits
